# stopRequestingMediaData()

**Instance Method**

Cancels any current [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVQueuedSampleBufferRendering/requestMediaDataWhenReady(on:using:)] call.

## Declaration

```swift
func stopRequestingMediaData()
```

## Discussion

Always pair a call to [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVQueuedSampleBufferRendering/requestMediaDataWhenReady(on:using:)] with this method. You can call this method from inside or outside of the requesting method’s block parameter.

## Requesting media

- **isReadyForMoreMediaData**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the receiver is able to accept more sample buffers.
- **enqueue(_:)**: Sends a sample buffer to the queue for rendering.
- **requestMediaDataWhenReady(on:using:)**: Tells the target to invoke a client-supplied block in order to gather sample buffers for playback.
